data_usage: Average annual temperature change was plotted as a time series for the contiguous United States, for 1901-2012 (relative to the 1901-1960 average temperature).
methodology: Annual mean temperatures were averaged for all grid points in the contiguous U.S. and plotted as a time series from 1901 to 2012.
output_artifacts:
Custom python codes written by Michael Wehner
